name: error_bar
title: Errorbar
description: Improves on the built-in errorbars.  Adds support for x-axis.  X and Y errorbars can be added as a single series or independently. Data format is:   [x,y,left,right,low,high].  For example, if you had a data point that was at (20,30) and had an x error of +/- 2 and a y error of +/- 5, your data point would look like this: [20,30,18,22,25,35]
